TopicTitle: What do YOU listen to when you play KSP?

Articles.Content: As the title says, what do YOU listen to when you play KSP? I personally listen to the Eureka 7 ost, in particular this one:

Smashing Pumpkins, "Rocket". For obvious reasons.

Can't link, at office, no youtubes while office.

Podcasts, actually.

Silly stuff, usually re-listens of the Yogpod or Hello Internet. It's just the right balance of interesting/nonsense that you can listen to it running in the background and have a laugh. When the podcast is too intelligent or too interesting I find it just becomes a distraction. Same thing with most of the music that I like. I prefer listening to that sort of stuff on the bus or before going to bed, when I don't have anything to distract me from.
I listen to the best soundtrack in the world: rocket engines burning.

Typically the TV.

Sometimes my colleagues during a teleconference.

It depends, usually something calm like OSTs from games or movies.

BUT at every launch, with all the fire and POWER there will always be a "Dragonforce" Song to make it more awesome.

Like 'Through the fire and flames' ; 'Revolution Deathsquad' ; 'Soldiers of the Wasteland' ; 'Heroes of our Time'

I'm actually still listening to the standard KSP soundtrack.

But I have pondered finding some new (for a given value of 'new') laid back lounge jazz to provide variation but stay in KSP mood;)

Silence. Space is silent

Though sometimes, if something goes wrong, I'll flip on David Bowie (you know the track...)

Beach boys, beach boys everywhere !

But for the launch it's this... ALWAYS
Usually my wife.

Pink Floyd. Very relaxing, and spacey enough to fit with Jeb's space adventures.

EDIT : the ksp soundtrack is very good too

Been on a 70s/80s binge lately.

Lots of Aerosmith, Pink Floyd, ELO, etc.
I've been semi-watching The Walking Dead lately during my KSPness lately...

In this order, wherever possible:

Snooker --> LCS --> Come Dine with Me (no judging) --> imaqtpie stream

And you thought you had me all worked out!
My soundtrack's been heavily reliant on JosÃƒÂ© GonzÃƒÂ¡lez lately:
Podcasts for me.
[h=1]Jean Michel Jarre - Oxygene[/h]
I just play this in the background......It syncs up perfectly more then you think:
I usually have the Trance.FM Progressive stream going. Or just random music from my hard drive.

Most of the time, youtube xD If not someone doing KSP, then someone with Cities Skylines tips. When desperate, the latest Yogscast adventures

Why yes I do have a paid Spotify sub :S
A laptop fan fighting the battle to keep my house from burning down.

What's with capitalizing the YOU in the titles of these posts? I'll never get that. Kids today.

Anyway, I listen to myself talk, if I'm recording. Music would just get in the way. If I'm just playing I usually just listen to all my music on shuffle.

I usually have all of my Spotify music on an endless shuffle... I listen to all kinds of things... Here are allof the artists I listen to. There are a lot, be warned...:

When I was building my large stations around the kerbol system, I listened to MercyMe's album "Welcome to the New". Particularly "Finish What He Started".
